title: Composition
text: Remember that to solve f(g(x)), we need to plug in the value of g(x) into the value of $$x$$ in f(x).

title: Composition
text: We need to plug in g(x), or $$x^2+3$$, for the $$x$$ in the function f: $$\sqrt{x^2+3}+2$$. There is no way to simplify this expression, so we are left with our final answer.
